name: Plastic Love
description:
A game made with Ren'Py for the Strawberry Jam 3!
Inspired by HuniePop, Jazzpunk and the robot strippers from Vegas.

Point-based visual novel in which you flirt with sexy robots. Your goal is to take them all on a date, but will you be able to gain their love and trust?

Music from https://www.purple-planet.com/chilled

  • Menu: Arcade Maze
  • Bar: Digital World
  • Alley: Global Tech
  • Strip: Electro Motion
